a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Lung cancer death rates, United States
Reported annual death rate from lung, bronchus or trachea cancers per 100,000 people, based on the underlying
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized. All deaths in a country may not have
been registered with a cause of death.
